rm.requestResponse

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • rm.requestResponse.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Message is used to encapsulate the server's address (hostname) and port together with the "real" message content to be sent.

    An Message object can transferred using Component's methods.

    The content can be an arbitrary Object or any instance of a subclass of Object. This requires an explicit cast after extracting the object from the message.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rainer Mueller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
